title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, February 24, 2022
description: "Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart." – Steve Jobs, born on this day (1955).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart." – Steve Jobs, born on this day (1955).
